title: 2 recent Ottawa sexual assaults could be linked police say
text:
2 recent Ottawa sexual assaults could be linked, police say 
CBC News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Ottawa police are searching for a white man in his 20s after two women reported being approached from behind and sexually assaulted on consecutive nights this week. 
A woman was grabbed from behind while walking on Chesterton Drive in Nepean and sexually assaulted around 11 p.m. on Monday, police said. The man ran away after the woman screamed. On Tuesday, a woman was grabbed from behind while walking on Colonel By Drive near Hog's Back and sexually assaulted around 9 p.m., police said. Again, the man ran away after the woman screamed. 
In both cases, the suspect is described as a white...
